original_text: For physical training is of some value, but godliness has value for all things, holding promise for both the present life and the life to come.
korean_text: 육체의 연단은 약간의 유익이 있으나 경건은 범사에 유익하니 금생과 내생에 약속이 있느니라

sentences.original_text: For physical training is of some value
but godliness has value for all things
holding promise for both the present life

sentences.korean_translation: 장차 올 생명에 대한 약속도 지닌다
